oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-09-17 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 17, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Hank Locklin, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Jimmie Selph, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1093rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Hank Snow; Hank Locklin; Jordanaires; Stringbean
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Hank Snow) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Hank Snow) (recording) -- Hank Snow introduces Hank Locklin -- Send Me The Pillow That You Dream On (Hank Locklin, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Stringbean -- Stringbean And His Old Banjo (Stringbean) -- Hank Snow talks -- Miller's Cave (Hank Snow, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Snow, Hank; Wise, Chubby; Locklin, Hank
